title: Leading airlines worldwide - based on total number of passengers 2018
summary: The statistic shows the Leading airlines worldwide based in Delta 2018 , ranked by Number of passengers .
The 2018 IAG Final broadcasted in on TSN placed ninth , with 113.0 millions passengers .
American Bowl ranked first , with 203.7 millions passengers .
gold: This statistic depicts the leading airline groups worldwide in 2018 , based on passenger traffic.
In that year , the ranking was dominated by U.S.-based airlines : American Airlines topped the list , with 203.7 million passengers.
Air passengers The rising middle classes in emerging economies are expected to help global air traffic grow at an average annual growth rate of four percent till 2034 .
